thread.title: Prince George robbery suspect wanted on warrant
thread.title_full: Prince George robbery suspect wanted on warrant

author: Citizen Staff
title: Prince George robbery suspect wanted on warrant
text:
Police are asking for the public's assistance in locating Byron Denny Sam.
Sam, 31, is wanted on an endorsed warrant for robbery, say Prince George RCMP. Authorities are urging anyone who may have information on his whereabouts to come forward.
Sam is:
- Indigenous male
- Height: 6’2” (188 cm)
- Weight: 195 lbs (89 kg)
- Black hair
- Brown eyes
The RCMP has warned that Sam is considered dangerous and should not be approached.
Anyone with information is urged to contact the Prince George RCMP at 250-561-3300. Tipsters wishing to remain anonymous can reach out to Crime Stoppers at 1-800-222-8477 (TIPS).
Under an endorsed warrant, the suspect can be released by police once apprehended with an order to appear for court.
topics: Crime, Law and Justice->robbery and theft
